titles.title: I will sing of my Redeemer

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing, oh, sing of my Redeemer, With His blood He purchased me, On the cross He sealed my pardon, Paid the debt, and made me free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will tell the wondrous story, How my lost estate to save, In His boundless love and mercy, He the ransom freely gave.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I will praise my dear Redeemer, His triumphant pow’r I’ll tell, How the victory He giveth Over sin, and death, and hell.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
